action_output:
Reason: The search results indicate no data connection, which may hinder further actions. To proceed with searching for the Files app, I need to connect to a Wi-Fi network. I will click on "Select a Wi-Fi network" to attempt to connect to a network.
Action: {"action_type": "click", "index": 47}
action_reason: The search results indicate no data connection, which may hinder further actions. To proceed with searching for the Files app, I need to connect to a Wi-Fi network. I will click on "Select a Wi-Fi network" to attempt to connect to a network.
summary: Action selected: {"action_type": "click", "index": 47}. Clicked "Select a Wi-Fi network" to address connectivity issues before searching for the Files app, now in the Wi-Fi settings screen.
